body_html:
Ok thanks, I was confused because the documentation says otherwise.

It seems Eigen now implements the (regularized) incomplete beta, both for cpu and gpu:
https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/dox-devel/group__CoeffwiseMathFunctions.html
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/190/add-ternaryfunctors-and-the-betainc/diff

Not sure if it is in stable Eigen yet, have to check.

body:
Ok thanks, I was confused because the documentation says otherwise.

It seems Eigen now implements the (regularized) incomplete beta, both for cpu and gpu:
https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/dox-devel/group__CoeffwiseMathFunctions.html
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/190/add-ternaryfunctors-and-the-betainc/diff

Not sure if it is in stable Eigen yet, have to check.
